name: AI Rebellion VR
description: Do you want to fly a spaceship by your own hands like intergalactic pilot in VR? AI Rebellion gives you this unique opportunity with full support of Oculus Touch and HTC Vive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 or better Processor: Intel Core i7 4790k Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970  or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 7 GB available space
